name: .CLKW File Extension
summary: Learn about .CLKW files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: To use a CLKW file with Crick Software Clicker (Windows, Mac), place it in the app's Word Banks directory. You'll then be able to set the CLKW file as your primary word bank (by opening User Preferences and selecting your file in the Writing â†’ Pop-up Word Bank section). After setting the CLKW file as your primary word bank, you can use the Pop-up Word Bank feature to open it.
